# WAPairedDevice.ID

**Type Alias**

A type of value that uniquely identifies the paired device.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ID = UInt64
```

## Getting the app-specific identifier

- **id**: A stable ID that you can use to uniquely identify a device.

items.description: A stable ID that you can use to uniquely identify a device.
items.name: id
